navbar.description: Some thoughts about cryptography, web development and 3D graphics

jobs.one: Fullstack developer (04/20 - now)Redesign and technical levels of various web applications on behalf of a major French energy company. Integrated in an Agile SAFe dev team, I have to redesign old applications, in technical and architectural terms. We have to make them safe in terms of web security (SAST, audits), user-friendly (UX design, support, new interface), and developer-friendly (working CI/CD, new technical stacks). Context: Java EE (6, 7 and 8), JSP, Gitlab/Jenkins, Ansible, CxSAST, OWASP ZAP
jobs.three: DevSecOps team developer (01/20 - 04/20)Realization of various CI/CD developments on behalf of a major French energy company. Integrated in a DevSecOps team, I had the occasion to acquire new technical skills, discover CI/CD development and DevSecOps methodology. I had to help various project teams with their CI/CD stacks and develop new solutions for them. Context: Jenkins, Ansible, Gitlab, Docker, RedHat OS, Git Flow
jobs.four: Fullstack developer (02/19 - 12/19)Development of a web application on behalf of a major French energy company. Integrated in a small dev team, I had the occasion to acquire technical skills, help the development of a largely used application and work with SAFe framework, in interaction with various trades : UX Designer, Product Owners, Business Managers, Architects... Number of single users per month: 35000. Context: Agile SAFe project, Angular 7, Material design, Java Spring, Hibernate, Elastic ELK
